attributes.action: intervene to end the postal strikes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The current postal strike is disrupting not only residental mail but that of buisnesses; particulary small buisness.  This is damaging to the economy and therefore it is urgent the government does everything in its power to end the strikes.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
